titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7668

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE
Frankfort, Aug 22d 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec State
Sir
Lieut: Colo Montgomery Howard has resigned (date of Com: Nov 18, 1861.)
Lt. James Tyler has resigned (date Nov. 11. 1861)
Lt. Wm Gilgore has resigned (date Nov 19. 1861.)
Lt. U. T. Merit has reisgned (date Oct. 8. 1861.)
Lt. A. Turner has resigned (date Ap. 8. 1862.)
The following Comms have been issued and delivered viz:

✓Wm Knight Captain
✓Daniel P. Walling 2d. Lieut:
✓Elin Logston 2d. Lieut: Sup: } all dated Aug. 21, 1862 --

✓John G. Pond Captain
✓Reuben T. Scott 1st Lieut:
✓John M. Cotton 2d Lieut
✓Stephen Stone 2d. Lieut. super } all dated Aug. 21, 1862

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken. Vols:
